00052    function getIdFromRef($ref)
00053    {    
00054                 if ( $ref === null or is_numeric ($ref) ) 
00055                 {
00056                         return $ref;
00057                 }
00058                 
00059                 if ( ! is_string ( $ref ) ) 
00060                 {
00061                         $this->raiseError("qcl_auth_common::getIdFromRef : integer or string expected, got '$ref'");    
00062                 }
00063                 $row = $this->db->getRow("
00064                         SELECT `{$this->key_id}` 
00065                         FROM `{$this->table}` 
00066                         WHERE `{$this->key_namedId}` = '$ref'  
00067                 ");
00068                 $result=$row[$this->key_id];
00069                 return $result;
00070    }
00071    
00077    function getAll($orderBy=null)
00078    {
00079                 if ($orderBy)
00080                 {
00081                         $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table} ORDER BY `$orderBy`"; 
00082                 }
00083                 else
00084                 {
00085                         $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table}";                  
00086                 }
00087         return $this->db->getAllRows($sql);     
00088    }
00089    
00094    function getById($id)
00095    {
00096                 return $this->db->getRow("
00097             SELECT * 
00098                         FROM `{$this->table}` 
00099                         WHERE `{$this->key_id}` = $id;
00100         ");     
00101    }
00102    
00107         function getByName($name)
00108         {
00109                 return $this->db->getRow("
00110                     SELECT * 
00111                                 FROM `{$this->table}` 
00112                                 WHERE `{$this->key_namedId}` = '$name'
00113         ");     
00114         }
00115 
00120         function getByRef($ref)
00121         {
00122                 if ( is_numeric ($ref) )
00123                 {
00124                         return $this->getById($ref); 
00125                 }
00126                 elseif ( is_string ($ref) )
00127                 {
00128                         return $this->getByName($ref);
00129                 }
00130                 else
00131                 {
00132                         $this->raiseError("qcl_auth_common::getByRef : integer or string expected, got '$ref'");
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 
00141         function getDescriptiveName($ref)
00142         {
00143                 $row = $this->getByRef($ref);
00144                 return $row[$this->key_descriptiveName];
00145         }
00146    
00150    function getAllNames()
00151    {
00152                 $rows = $this->getAll();
00153         $result = array();
00154         foreach ( $rows as $row )
00155         {
00156                 $result[] = $row[$this->key_namedId];
00157         }
00158         return $result;
00159    }

00168                 return $this->db->insert($this->table,$row);

00170

00177         {

00179         }

00186         function delete ( $ids )

00201     function method_getData($params)
00202     {
00203        $itemId  = $params[0];
00204        $result  = array();              
00205 
00206                 // get record
00207                 $itemData = $this->getById($itemId);
00208 
00209                 // convert to table data model
00210                 $data = array();
00211                 
00212                 foreach($itemData as $key => $value )
00213                 {
00214                         $meta = $this->meta[$key];
00215                         if ( ! is_array( $meta ) ) continue;
00216                         $data[]         = array($key,__($key),$value,$meta);
00217                 }
00218                 
00219                 // return data
00220                 $this->set( "tabledatamodel", $data );          
00221                 return $this->getResult();
00222     }
00223     
00230         function method_create($params)
00231         {
00232                 $namedId                = $params[1];
00233                 $parentId               = $params[2];
00234                 
00235                 // insert new empty record
00236                 $data = array();
00237                 $data[$this->key_namedId] = $namedId;
00238                 $itemId = $this->insert($data);
00239                 
00240                 if ( is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_user") )
00241                 {
00242                         $this->addToRole ( $itemId, $parentId );
00243                 }
00244                 elseif ( is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_permission") )
00245                 {
00246                         $this->addToRole ( $itemId, $parentId );        
00247                 }       
00248                 
00249                 // load and show item 
00250                 $this->addMessage( "qcl.auth.messages.{$this->shortName}.created", $itemId );
00251                 
00252                 return $this->getResult();
00253         }
00254         
00261     function method_update($params)
00262     {
00263         if ( is_object( $params[1] ) )
00264         {
00265                 $data = (array)$params[1]; 
00266         }
00267         else
00268         {
00269                 $this->raiseError("qcl.auth.item.update : invalid parameter");
00270         }
00271         
00272         if ( is_numeric( $id = $params[2] ) )
00273         {
00274                 $data[$this->key_id] = $id;
00275         }
00276         elseif ( ! $data[$this->key_id] )
00277         {
00278                 $this->raiseError("qcl_auth_common::method_update : no id given!");
00279         }
00280         
00281                 $this->update($data);
00282                 
00283                 $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.{$this->shortName}.updated",$data[$this->key_id]);
00284                 return $this->getResult();
00285     }    
00286     
00293     function method_delete($params)
00294     {
00295        $itemId          = (int) $params[1];
00296        $parentId        = (int) $params[2];
00297        $this->delete($itemId);
00298 
00299                 if ( is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_user") or is_a( $this, "qcl_auth_permission") )
00300                 {
00301                         $this->removeFromRole ( $itemId, $parentId );
00302                 }
00303 
00304                 $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.{$this->shortName}.deleted",$itemId);
00305 
00306                 return $this->getResult();
00307 
00308     }
